subject: ftp.debian.org not updating
body:
Reporting that ftp.debian.org has not updated since June 23rd, in case
it's been missed by the admins.

Ricardo Yanez
ftp.cl.d.o


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
